details.text: Source Code System http://loinc.org is only supported on the terminology server, so the source codes are not validated for performance reasons
The target display 'Code 1' for the code 'http://hl7.org/fhir/test/CodeSystem/cs-val-example#c1' is not valid. Possible displays: 'display 1'
The target display '3rd code' for the code 'http://hl7.org/fhir/test/CodeSystem/cs-val-example#c3' is not valid. Possible displays: 'display 3'
